data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Koppal, Karnataka, India to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Koppal, Karnataka, India
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Koppal, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 90 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the county of Koppal, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Koppal, Karnataka, India so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Shinligar people might believe through him.
Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the county of Koppal, Karnataka, India who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the county of Koppal a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the county of Koppal, Karnataka, India.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

location.name: Koppal
location.people_groups_list: Halleer, Sudra, Bant, Bedar Kashmir (Muslim traditions), Sardar (Hindu traditions)
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Halleer (4,500), Sudra (5,700), Bant (1,400), Bedar Kashmir (Muslim traditions) (3,900), Sardar (Hindu traditions) (4,000)
